addon_desc_amo.message: Useful additional features whenever you open a new tab

appDesc.message: Cliqz Tab replaces Chrome's default new tab page and adds backgrounds, favorites, news and Cliqz's anonymous quick search.

browserAppDesc.message: Get search results faster, directly in the browser. Start typing and see suggestions from around the Web in real time, right below the URL bar. And because Cliqz avoids collecting personally identifiable data, or building user profiles, your results are more private.

ghosteryTabAppDesc.message: More privacy, more favorites, more freedom, more style and more news on each new tab!

ghosteryTabAppName.message: Ghostery Start Tab with Private Search (Beta)

offersAppDesc.message: Save money while shopping online with our high value vouchers.When you need them, where you need them. And absolutely private.
